Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん、占いは誰に教わったんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, who was it that taught you how to read fortunes?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……自分で覚えたの…… 小さい頃は、絵を眺めるくらいだったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'm self-taught... Though, when I was a child, I would only look at the pictures...

Entry.JapaneseText: このタロットに触れているだけで、 嫌な事をみんな忘れられた……
Entry.EnglishText: Just by touching these tarot cards, I could forget all the bad things that happened to me...

Entry.JapaneseText: そのうち、占いにも興味を持つようになって、 少しずつ、ね……
Entry.EnglishText: And before long, I gradually grew more and more interested in fortune telling...
